mapper.insert: insert into researchitem(researchitem_num, research_num, researchitem_content) values((select nvl(max(researchitem_num),0)+1 from researchitem), #{research_num}, #{researchitem_content})
mapper.select: select research_num , max(case when rnum1 = 1 then researchitem_content end ) result1 , max(case When rnum2 = 1 then researchitem_cnt end ) result2 , max(case When rnum1 = 2 then researchitem_content end ) result3 , max(case When rnum2 = 2 then researchitem_cnt end ) result4 , max(case When rnum1 = 3 then researchitem_content end ) result5 , max(case When rnum2 = 3 then researchitem_cnt end ) result6 , max(case When rnum1 = 4 then researchitem_content end ) result7 , max(case When rnum2 = 4 then researchitem_cnt end ) result8 from ( select research_num, researchitem_content, researchitem_cnt, row_number() over(partition by research_num order by researchitem_content) as rnum1, row_number() over(partition by research_num order by researchitem_content) as rnum2 from researchitem ) group by research_num
